content:
My relationship with my parents is pretty good. Tbh it has been more to do with their own life changes that has made their relationship with me better than the other way around, but I'm sure that I've been better as well to some degree. 

Self-realization doesn't really change that so much unless you yourself are "the problem" so to speak. If your parents or anyone are genuinely egotistical and harmful people, then your own change in perspective will not really make much difference.
